ygData.subject: RE: Lord Cazic Thule Killed
ygData.msgSnippet: he has been killed on other servers before and after PoF was made more difficult.  phew i thought i was reading this on the mith marr mailing list, hate when i
ygData.messageBody:
he has been killed on other servers before and after PoF was made more
difficult. phew i thought i was reading this on the mith marr mailing list,
hate when i miss big stuff =) has has had other loot, for example
bloodfire, 1h slashing war only 11 24 weapon procs blood boil.

Shada

>
> From: "Bobby" <merlin26@...>
>
> Greetings,
>
> I do not know if this has happened on other servers or not
> but just thought
> I would let yall know incase anyone has any more information.
>
> The other night on the plane of fear(not me) groups killed Lord Cazic
> Thule. Alot of the heros were friends of mine and non bards
> MUHAHAH and
> were extremely excited as to its loot.
>
> Well their excitement turned to dissapointment when the only
> loot on the
> monster was two(2) Picolos (fyi smaller version of a flute).
>
> There were 2 level 50 bards that assisted and they got the
> instraments. That
> for now is the extent of my knowledge BUT I am EXTREMELY curious about
> these.
>
> Dont know if he has been killed on other servers but if
> anyone knows any
> information that would be great.
>
>
> Tuldar 28th bard
>
> Tarrew Mar
